item.title: LC-IMPACT: A regionalized life cycle damage assessment method
item.description: https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/jiec.13018 Abstract Here, we present the LC-IMPACT method that provides characterization factors at the damage level for 11 impact categories related to three areas of protection (human health, ecosystem quality, natural resources).
